snippet.title: ■■ ARCHIVE ■■ Routine - Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/60...

This footage is now outdated, ROUTINE has now been fully rebooted in UE4: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y_wpvT6uDDQ

ROUTINE is a First Person Sci-Fi Horror set in an abandoned Lunar Base designed around an 80’s vision of the future. 

Curious exploration turns into a need for survival when a lunar base goes completely quiet. Searching for answers puts you face to face with an enemy that is certain the main threat is you. Discoveries lead to deeper unknowns and the only way to go is forward.

https://mick-gordon.com/
https://lunar-software.com/
https://rawfury.com/
